articles.author: Pranav Dixit
articles.title: Apple stock dropped as WWDC got going. Here's why. - Business Insider
articles.description: Apple's stock suddenly dropped a few minutes into its WWDC keynote, highlighting relatively slow AI development compared to Big Tech rivals.
articles.content:
Apple shares suddenly dropped a few minutes into its WWDC keynote on Monday. The culprit appears to be one word: Siri.
About six minutes into the presentation, Apple's stock abruptly fell more than … [+2813 chars]
